segments.text: I'm looking for a gift for my daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she needs something to help her at school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . How much is one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our newest 15 - inch Pro is only $ 2,100 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only $ 2,100 ? Okay , let me have one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . Will that be cash , check , or credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me dig my VISA out of my purse .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , if you'll just sign here , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I need to buy anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All she has to do is open the box and follow the instructions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . If you have any problems , just call .
segments.speaker: S2
